sections.heading: Objections to registration of support order for enforcementAn objection for any purpose to the registration of the support order must be filed by the obligor with the registering court within twenty days from the date of mailing of the notice required in Article 2791(C)(3)(a), or within twenty days
sections.text: Objections to registration of support order for enforcementAn objection for any purpose to the registration of the support order must be filed by the obligor with the registering court within twenty days from the date of mailing of the notice required in Article 2791(C)(3)(a), or within twenty days from the date of service required in Article 2791(C)(3)(b).Added by Acts 1997, No. 603, ยง2; Acts 1999, No. 210, ยง1.
